languages.text: "Вычищать надо все и с размахом. С тех пор, как на твой мир напали нелюди, на орбите по сей день болтаются остовы погибших кораблей. Зацепи их судами да швырни в гнезда нечисти, что нынче посягает на твою землю!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"
languages.original_text: "Вычищать надо все и с размахом. С тех пор, как на твой мир напали нелюди, на орбите по сей день болтаются остовы погибших кораблей. Зацепи их судами да швырни в гнезда нечисти, что нынче посягает на твою землю!"

traits.locale_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the abhumans have attacked your world, there are the wreckages of the downed ships floating around the orbit everywhere. Hook it up with your ships and send them flying into the eyries of the spawn that is trying to encroach on your land!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the abhumans have attacked your world, there are the wreckages of the downed ships floating around the orbit everywhere. Hook it up with your ships and send them flying into the eyries of the spawn that is trying to encroach on your land!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

languages.text: “这场净化必须做得很彻底才行。自从那些异形渣滓袭击了你的世界之后，被击毁的飞船残骸就在轨道上到处漂浮。让你的飞船牵引那些残骸，之后把它们丢到怪物的巢穴上！”
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: “这场净化必须做得很彻底才行。自从那些异形渣滓袭击了你的世界之后，被击毁的飞船残骸就在轨道上到处漂浮。让你的飞船牵引那些残骸，之后把它们丢到怪物的巢穴上！”

languages.text: «La limpieza debe ser exhaustiva. Desde que la escoria xenos atacó vuestro mundo, los restos de naves derribadas flotan por todas partes en órbita. Conéctenlos con tus naves y enviénlos volando hacia los nidos de este engendro que intenta invadir sus dominios».
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: «La limpieza debe ser exhaustiva. Desde que la escoria xenos atacó vuestro mundo, los restos de naves derribadas flotan por todas partes en órbita. Conéctenlos con tus naves y enviénlos volando hacia los nidos de este engendro que intenta invadir sus dominios».

languages.text: 「浄化は徹底的に行うべきだ。ゼノのクズどもが君の惑星を攻撃して以来、撃墜された船の残骸が軌道上のあちこちに浮かんでいる。それらを君の船につなぎ合わせて、領域に侵入しようとするスポーンの巣に向かって飛ばすんだ！」
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: 「浄化は徹底的に行うべきだ。ゼノのクズどもが君の惑星を攻撃して以来、撃墜された船の残骸が軌道上のあちこちに浮かんでいる。それらを君の船につなぎ合わせて、領域に侵入しようとするスポーンの巣に向かって飛ばすんだ！」

languages.text: « Il faut une purge rigoureuse. Depuis que les xénos ont attaqué votre monde, il y a des épaves un peu partout en orbite. Faites-les remorquer par vos vaisseaux et envoyez-les s'écraser sur les nids de cette vermine qui tente d'envahir votre domaine. »
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: « Il faut une purge rigoureuse. Depuis que les xénos ont attaqué votre monde, il y a des épaves un peu partout en orbite. Faites-les remorquer par vos vaisseaux et envoyez-les s'écraser sur les nids de cette vermine qui tente d'envahir votre domaine. »

languages.text: "Die Säuberung muss gründlich sein. Seit der Xenos-Abschaum Eure Welt angegriffen hat, treiben überall im Orbit die Wracks abgeschossener Schiffe umher. Verbindet sie mit Euren Schiffen und lasst sie auf die Nester dieser Höllenbrut krachen, die in Euer Reich eindringen will!"
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Säuberung muss gründlich sein. Seit der Xenos-Abschaum Eure Welt angegriffen hat, treiben überall im Orbit die Wracks abgeschossener Schiffe umher. Verbindet sie mit Euren Schiffen und lasst sie auf die Nester dieser Höllenbrut krachen, die in Euer Reich eindringen will!"
